Module com.example.demo

Package com.example.game

package com.example.game
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.game.unitTesting
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Cell
    Cell.java To set the size, number, and the color of the cells.
    controller
    controller.java responsible for passing cells to destination, receive user input and process it accordingly
    EndGame
    EndGame.java To set the endGame scene including music if the user lost the game.
    GameScene
    GameScene.java The controller class for the whole functions in the board during a game Includes moves, add, spawns, sketching the boards tiles, when the cell reach the number to win, user's score, checking user lose or not, etc.
    leaderboard
    leaderboard.java Responsible for the whole score button's page from the index page.
    Main
    Main.java The main file will be run the program have started.
    Scoring
    Scoring.java Setting Scoring object to keep value passed from leaderboard.
    Setting
    Setting.java To control the setting page.
    spawn
    spawn.java Responsible for spawning cells, and detecting have empty cells or not to determine user win or lost the game
    TextMaker
    TextMaker.java To control how text are showed in respective scene, including the color and the font size
    WinGame
    WinGame.java To sketch the winGame scene of the 2048 game when the user reached the targeted value of the cell.
